data.message: Man hes been rapping since way before most of you were born, im pretty sure if he wants to come out with whack, he can come out with it. He ent gotta prove shit no more hes shown you what hes capable of. Greedy ass fans he ent gonna write something you can relate to all the time is he? If youre always looking for an emotional song that can help you drown in your own sorrow then im sorry but, get some help. Youre a grown ass adult stop expecting a musician to do the work for your lazy ass. Smh "Eminem is whack now" what cause youre incapable of handling your own emotions? Grow up, you cant always have a shoulder to cry on
